text: Gongylomorphus borbonicus is a small species of skink, a lizard in the family Scincidae. The species is endemic to Mauritius. ==References== ==External links== *Reptile Database - Gongylomorphus borbonicus. Category:Skinks Category:Reptiles and amphibians of Mauritius Category:Reptiles described in 1969
title: Gongylomorphus borbonicus
